name: bigquery-kafka-connect
description: kafka connect connector for Google BigQuery

scripts.test: istanbul cover _mocha -- --recursive --timeout 12500 -R spec test/int && istanbul check-coverage --statements 80
scripts.test-ci: istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- --timeout 12500 -R spec test/int && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Holger Adam
